document.full_text: heavy rains, deep snowfalls, monster floods and killing droughts are signs of a "new normal" of extreme u.s. weather events fueled by climate change, scientists and government planners said on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. weather extremes show "new normal" climate
lines_and_colors: heavy rains, deep snowfalls, monster floods and killing droughts are signs of a "new normal" of extreme u.s. weather events fueled by climate change, scientists and government planners said on wednesday.
